control.name: Implement a monitoring system to alert the SOC operators
control.desc: Implement a monitoring system to alert the SOC operators of suspicious behaviors and potential data breaches. The purpose of proactive monitoring is to prevent data breaches or stop an active data breach before personal data is exfiltrated and hereby ensure adequate information security of personal data.

test.steps:
1. Test accessing user personal data mimicking the "suspicious" behavior of an malicious actor and verify activities are detected and relevant security personnel alerted by monitoring tools.
  2. Test unauthorized user personal data exfiltration and verify this is detected and relevant security personnel alerted by monitoring tools.
